name: Pirate Waters
description:
Prepare to be boarded! Pirate Waters is a very enjoyable 3D game. Sail your ship. Destroy enemy ships. Collect treasures and collect different power-ups. Rescue sailors. Upgrade your ship at docks. Sail through 20 levels across different environments (south, north, tropics, volcanoes, snow). Save the world from evil pirates and become a pirate too!

Enjoy the game! Arrr!
